short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Monkey Mart game on GameComets. Monkey Mart online game. Created for Monkey Mart fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Monkey Mart is a relaxing idle/management game where you take on the role of an adorable monkey running a supermarket. Start by planting and harvesting fruits, then proceed to stock various food items like bananas, corn, eggs, and more on your shelves. 

Customers will grab their selections and line up at the cash register, where you'll collect payments by simply standing next to it. Expand your market by unlocking new aisles and adding a range of products. Employ assistants to manage the maintenance of the aisles and train your team in new skills. 

Extension Features:
1. Able to play Monkey Mart on Chrome Browser.
2. Able to access to More Games.

If you have any questions about our Monkey Mart game extension or just want to give us some feedback, feel free to send us a message or write a review! We'd love to hear from you. You can mouse over to Support tab on the extension, then click on "visit the developer's support site" to contact us.
